title: Girls Love Guitars
author: VD
content_html:
This was going to be the final track for the SOULSIGMA CD, until I received permission from the original songwriter to include a cover of one of his songs on it as well. However, this is not the Rock Stars mix that will appear on the CD, this is the original Still in School mix. UATV subscribers, please remember that the paywall goes up in one week.

DISCUSS ON SG
